entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.2°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 48 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then flurries at times heavy changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon then northwest 50 gusting to 70. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
